title: Hangouts Meet
description:
Simple, frictionless, and high quality video meetings by Google. Collaborate and build relationships with your team and partners regardless of where you are in the world.

    Key features include:
    • High-definition video and audio meetings with up to 250* participants
    • Real-time captions powered by Google speech-to-text technology
    • Easy access - just share a link and anyone can join with one click from desktop or mobile
    • International dial-in numbers to any meeting for team members who prefer to call in
    • Integration with Calendar for seamless scheduling and easy access to meeting details and calendar attachments from your Meet video call

    Anyone can join a meeting on Meet through an invite, however, some capabilities are available only to G Suite customers.

    *Available only in G Suite Enterprise Edition
descriptionHTML:
Simple, frictionless, and high quality video meetings by Google. Collaborate and build relationships with your team and partners regardless of where you are in the world.

Key features include:
• High-definition video and audio meetings with up to 250* participants
• Real-time captions powered by Google speech-to-text technology
• Easy access - just share a link and anyone can join with one click from desktop or mobile
• International dial-in numbers to any meeting for team members who prefer to call in
• Integration with Calendar for seamless scheduling and easy access to meeting details and calendar attachments from your Meet video call

Anyone can join a meeting on Meet through an invite, however, some capabilities are available only to G Suite customers.

*Available only in G Suite Enterprise Edition
summary: Simple, frictionless video meetings for G Suite from Hangouts
developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
recentChanges:
• Improved support for 250 person meetings
• Real-time captions
• International dial-in numbers for any meeting
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: The app is alright. When the presenter's connection is terrible we are never able to see the screen and such. However, if their connection is good, then the quality is actually not bad. Although, I would like the creators to add a “(s/b) is typing...” bubble when someone is typing. This will prevent any unnecessary anger grunts from our teachers when the class is not answering their questions, even when someone is typing as fast as possible.

Has worked flawlessly for me for quite a while. Lately, sound quality is even decent on low bandwidth connections. Audio can be difficult to understand if presenters use cheap phone microphones and stand far away, but you can't blame the service for that.

App is great, but the output volume is too loud on earphones even when my phone volume is set to it's minimum. I have to take my earphones out and set them near my ear to have the app not screech into my eardrums. An option to adjust output volume in-app would be really useful.

Chaotic, laggy, plain unorganized. Do not get this. I was excited the first time I saw this app, now I know I'm being led to dread whenever I see it. Its just crazy to the limits. That morning I had art class, I couldn't hear anything and even when I could it was bad quality. I had to sit there for about four hours listening to the disturbing sounds of people shouting and voices lagging. If you ask me, that was a one star experience.If you think this app is good by the outside think again.

I don't even understand how Google's own app doesn't work on Android. Every time I try to join a Hangouts meetup, I get an error message and cannot join. Re-installed and re-started phone to no avail. This app deserves negative stars. OnePlus 7 Pro

title: Adia – Jobs on Demand
description:
Finding a job you love shouldn’t be hard. Adia makes it easy. You can book ANY job you see, with just one tap. It’s awesome, we know.

How it works: Once you download the Adia app, you’ll create a profile, telling us your interests, skills, and availability. You’ll go through one-and-done onboarding to get hired. Once your profile is activated, you can book any full-time, part-time, and pick-up gigs you see in the app.

We’ll match you to jobs you’ll love, based on your preferences. Book the jobs you want to work, and pass on the ones you don’t.  Whenever a new job is available, we’ll notify you. Work as little or as much as you want - it’s 100% up to you.

Perks: as a W-2 Adia employee, you’re eligible for full-time benefits. Plus, you’ll get paid every Friday.

We’ve got something for everyone:

• Service industry
• Hospitality
• Catering
• Special events
• General labor
• Retail

Whatcha waiting for? Download Adia now and start booking gigs.

recentChanges:
You’ve got all the details you need, when you need them.

No more wondering where the job is, and what you’ll need to wear. You’ll see exactly how many miles from home it is and the dress code in the Job Match, making it easier to decide if you want to book the gig.

Once you RSVP, you’ll instantly receive a chat with the business POC, the best way to reach them, and any additional info needed before arriving.
comments: I am being forced to use this app for my pay for proctoring the SAT, nothing else.They ask for too much personal information. I've encountered several glitches. First, I could not enter my DOB, so a rep had to input it. Then I had to ask a friend to verify the info on my passport, an invasion of privacy. When I finally found someone who's willing to enter their info on the site, they were supposed to get an email asking for in person verification of my passport, but didn't get it.

Just a waste of time as the App is totally glitchy and won't allow you to book even if position/gig available. Called several times to correct/inquire the issue but no help and basically told to delete it if it didn't suit me also asked on several calls if it was personal and if I was welcomed never a straight answer and after reading the other reviews I see it's not just me and I ask why not update the app with fixes.... bad customer service!!!

My profile got deactivated after I called and ask why I was still In onboarding process.This app is not what it says. I am certified and sanitation. You will not be able to work with Adia if you do pass the phone interview you can not schedule for jobs and they will tell you why they choose not pick you and there is no second chance for an interview. I called and the told me I was denied.

None of your links work the way they are supposed to. I cannot create a password or change one because the link to change it send me right back to the download page. We should be able to just sign up and create a password at that point. This is kind of goofy the way its set up.

If I could give it 0 stars I would. I tried signing up with google and facebook and it wouldn't let. I then tried with email i put in most info and at the end it said there was an error and I'd have to try again later. Either fix the app or take it down already

title: Scanner App To PDF - TapScanner
description:
Tap Scanner app is a simple Camera document scanner app with high quality PDF output.

1. Scan documents, receipts, QR and business cards
Use Tap Scanner app to scan any type of document and save the scan to PDF!

2. Document Scanner app - Automatically detects borders
Tap Scanner automatically detects document borders when you scan a document!

3. Fine tune the image with many filters to reach perfection
TapScanner has many filters to help you get the best image quality when you scan a document!

4. Easily manage your documents
Tap Scanner lets you easily manage your scanned documents.

5. With a high quality PDF Scanner and PNG output.
Tap Scanner lets you export your document scan to PDF or PNG formats!

6. OCR - Convert image to text - supporting +110 Languages - enables output of live text from scanner.
Tap Scanner app has built in OCR with over 110 languages!

7. Sign & Send documents to others for signing with an electronic signature.
Scanner PDF lets you sign your scanned documents before sending them!

8. Cloud integration - backup and sync content to the cloud.
Tap Scanner lets you upload your scanned documents to your favourite cloud service supporting backup to: Google Drive, Dropbox and more.

9. Simplify document scanning & signing by adding custom fields to documents.
Tap Scanner even lets you add custom fields to your scanned document!

10. QR Scanner app - scan QR codes, and convert them to email, text and links seamlessly.
Tap Scanner can scan QR codes as well!

Try this Pdf Scanner app - it's free - try it now!

comments: Love this app! Been using it to send my 9y.o. son's work to his teacher via email during COVID-19 lockdown. Works perfectly. If it doesn't capture the entire image, it allows you to adjust. You can batch or single scan. Has ads, but easily closed out after a second.

As mentioned, this app truly feels like it's trying to scam me out of $50. Less than 72 hours after the start of the 3 day trial, I was charged. No warning. No email. Nothing. Absolutely not okay. 3 day trial? Ordered on the 16th, charged on the 19th. Less than 72 hours, THAT'S NOT 3 FREE DAYS. I've used the free version and watched ads for a while, but I'll definitely be uninstalling this app now. Disingenuous and exploitative.

People who want to cancel the subscription -- you cancel it in the playstore, not in the app itself! Click on the app and it should say under Uninstall and Open buttons "Manage subscription." You can follow the instructions/prompts to cancel from there

Easy to be honest! In managing or removing your subscription, press "manage subscription" then unsubsribe here within the playstore at the open option above. Tho, needs improvement in some already understandable letters, it sometimes converts numbers to letters. Yet, overall satisfied!

Good app with a scam to get you on yearly subscription for a high price. Just wanted to check it and found myself now struggling to get a refund from the developer. Feels like being cheated. Will not give a good review for such a behaviour.

title: Adobe Scan: PDF & Business Card Scanner with OCR
description:
Adobe Scan is a free document scanner with integrated OCR technology that instantly recognizes printed text and handwriting. Handle all your document scanning tasks even if you're working from home or out of the office.

Use this mobile document scanning app to turn anything — receipts, notes, documents, photos, business cards, even whiteboards — into an Adobe PDF with content you can reuse from each PDF and photo scan.

HOW ADOBE SCAN WORKS:

The Adobe Scan digital document scanner app makes anything scannable. Use it as a PDF scanner to create photo or PDF scans for free whenever you need them, whether you’re on the go, working from home, or in the office.

• SCAN ANYTHING, ANYWHERE, ANYTIME. 
Did you know you can scan photos, business cards, tax receipts, forms, notes, and more? The Adobe Scan digital document scanner app can scan anything.

• A MOBILE PDF SCANNER IN YOUR POCKET. 
Adobe Scan turns your phone camera into a PDF scanner. Capture documents, books, notes and more, then save them to PDF.

• CREATE A PHOTO SCAN. 
Scan your favorite photos for an easy way to convert any photo to PDF.

• SAVE CONTACTS WITH THE BUSINESS CARD SCANNER. 
With the business card scanner feature, contact information will be automatically extracted while scanning business cards so you can quickly save and organize contacts.

• RECEIPT SCANNER FOR EASY TAX FILING. 
Use Adobe Scan as a tax receipt scanner to track your expenses with ease. The receipt scanner allows you to scan and digitize all your receipts at once, making it helpful during tax filing season.

• OCR SCANNER WITH TEXT RECOGNITION. 
Turn your photo scan into a high-quality Adobe PDF document that unlocks content through automated text recognition (Optical Character Recognition or OCR). 

WHAT ELSE CAN ADOBE SCAN DO FOR YOU?

• BOOK SCANNER.
Using it as a book scanner allows you to digitize bulk pages and save multi-page digital documents in a snap.

• ENHANCE SCANS AND EDIT. 
Touch up photo scans, notes, and documents from your camera roll. Whether it’s a document or a photo, you can preview, reorder, crop, rotate and adjust color. 

• CLEANUP.
Remove and edit imperfections, erase stains, marks, creases, and even handwriting.

• RECYCLE CONTENT. 
Adobe Scan lets you reuse scanned content by creating a high-quality PDF that you can work within Adobe Acrobat Reader, thanks to OCR scanning.

• FIND DOCUMENTS IN PHOTOS. 
This powerful scanning app quickly finds documents and receipts in your photos and turns them into PDF scans. 

The Adobe Scan photo scanner is so easy to use, it will have you saying, “This is the best free PDF scanner for me!”

Terms & Conditions: 
Adobe General Terms of Use http://www.adobe.com/legal/terms.html 
Adobe Privacy Policy http://www.adobe.com/privacy/policy.html

Download the best free mobile scanner to convert photos, notes and documents to PDF files anywhere. Scan books, business cards, receipts and more with OCR technology and access them via the Adobe Document Cloud. Collaborate with your team efficiently, even if you work from home or are out of the office. Scan photos to high-quality PDFs and share digital docs more easily than ever before!

comments: I am sooo glad I found this app!!! It is super easy to use. It automatically opens up to allow you to get right to scanning. I love that you can clean up the image, like fill in a corner that has a piece of the background or erase creases. I had been putting images on a document and then saving it as a PDF, but the quality was not good, as I am sure you can imagine. I can now send professional scans. Thank you Adobe Scan!

Alright I take it back, they implemented a great share system similar to the Acrobat Reader app. My last preview is below. Congrats to the developers whole improved it, I hope I helped. Previous: [ Great scanning aweful sharing. 3 stars just because it has been like this a quite a while and it is pretty bad. ]

This App falls into 2nd place after CamScanner, which I've been using for several years.. This App does Everything that CamScanner does, and is (Free), the scan quality is as good as CamScanner. To get the same features in CamScanner you've got to get the paid version.. If I would of come across this App before CamScanner, I wouldn't have paid for CamScanner..

So far, so good. This is my second time using this and it's so helpful. I no longer have to find a scanner, connect to internet, scan in my files to my email, and make sure all is good. This app captures exactly what I'm needing.

This is a very good app, but I have rated it the least because it does not have an option to disable automatic uploads to the cloud, or to disable uploads at all. I will eventually uninstall the app once I find an alternative app that won't upload my files to the cloud.

title: Genius Scan - PDF Scanner
description:
Quickly scan your paper documents on the go and export them as multi-page PDF files.

*** 20+ million users *** 1000s of small businesses ***

Place any document in front of your device’s camera: our scanner app automatically recognizes the paper against the background, crops it, and cleans up the result. You obtain a crisp, legible scan. Batch scanning lets you scan dozens of pages in a matter of seconds. Powerful tools help you organize, share, or archive your documents.

== KEY FEATURES == 

Smart Scanning:

- Document detection & background removal
- Distortion correction
- Shadow removal and defect cleanup
- Filters (black & white, whiteboard, photo)
- Batch scanning

PDF Creation & Editing:

- Document merging & splitting
- Multiple page PDF creation
- Photos and PDF import

Security & Privacy:

- On-device document processing
+ Fingerprint locking
+ PDF password encryption

Document Organization:

- Document tagging
- Metadata and content search
+ Custom naming schemes (Smart Document Names)
+ Backup and multi-device sync with Genius Cloud (separate subscription)

Export:

- Email
+ Box, Dropbox, Evernote, Expensify, Google Drive, OneDrive, FTP, WebDAV.
+ Any WebDAV compatible service such as Citrix ShareFile, NextCloud, ownCloud, Synology, Yandex. 
+ Automatic background auto-export

OCR (Text Recognition):

+ Text extraction
+ Searchable PDF creation
+ Business card scanning & contact creation

The features denoted with [+] are available as part of Genius Scan+ (a one-time purchase).

== ABOUT US ==

It’s in the heart of Paris, France that The Grizzly Labs develops Genius Scan. We take pride in crafting apps that help millions of users throughout the world and hold ourselves to the highest standards in terms of quality and privacy. Get in touch with us @thegrizzlylabs if you have any questions.

recentChanges:
This update of Genius Scan brings a feature requested by many users: Text recognition (aka OCR).
It makes it possible to search documents by their content and produce searchable and selectable PDF documents.
It's only available for Genius Scan+ and Genius Cloud users.

We've also improved help pages, fixed a distortion issue and a problme when restoring backup files.
comments: This app definitely gets the job done. May not be all flashy but it does exactly what I need it to do. I have yet to run into any issues. The most frustrating thing about it is probably having trouble capturing the image. Most of the time it's no problem, but every now and then it will take forever to get a quality scan. Overall, 4 stars. Worth it.

This is a MUST HAVE app for both personal and for business that everyone should have. I LOVE IT. As a Realtor I no longer need to run back to the office to scan docs in order to send them to my clients. I am able to scan immediately where ever we are signing and clients really like and appreciate this type of service. This app has lots of great features. Thank you so much to the person or people that created this app that has made such a difference for my business.

Whew! I "think" my search is over. Lot's of free useful setup features and lots of one time, under 5 buck, purchases. So far, it's underrated! Try it, then buy the extra features. You can live without them, but why, when the total package is so affordable.

Amazing, useful, it is a game changer! I used this app for YEARS and I absolutely love it. Especially when you don't have an actual scanner. This app really makes your work look like a PDF document. BEST APP EVER! I recommended this app so MANY people, including family and they love it too! Honestly, it's even easier to use than an actual scanner and fax machine!

Excellent App. Turns paperwork into a pdf, gave me a choice of emails, drives, dropbox, and more. Makes going to Staples for scanning pdf's a chore of the past. Just takes a moment to pick up and auto center documents. I love it! Way to go! The perfect modern use of technology.

comments: I see nothing gained from having this app take up room on my phone. There's no way to log in or to even see if the app is working or what it's really doing. So I had to uninstall.
I received the update on my Samsung device, it still doesn't work. I had to uninstall.
Virus never install this. Completely on save Misleading full of irises

Turn off automatic updates. If you don't want apps like this showing up on your phone, don't do automatic updates for apps. I've always done updates manually and there are about 10 from Samsung and AT&T that are useless junk apps that won't end up on your phone if you do your updates manually. Everyone complains about Spyware but they always end up admitting they installed it to begin with and now can't uninstall it.

Says update, but I have never downloaded this and it is not installed on any off my devices. ATT just got into trouble AGAIN with the Federal Trade Commission. Now they are trying to force push this software... I see them getting fined again for this.

title: Square Appointments: Booking, Scheduling, Payments
description:
Square Appointments has everything you need to run your business from anywhere: online booking  that’s easy for you and your customers, a point of sale  that tracks customer details, and a secure, fast payments system —all in one place. It’s free for individuals. And really affordable for teams. Get 24/7 online booking, automatic appointment reminders, seamless payment processing, and no-show protection with Square Appointments for Android.

FREE FOR INDIVIDUALS
• Running your business with Square Appointments is free for individuals. Sole proprietors only pay for processing. If you have additional staff and need more calendars, try it out with a 30-day free trial.

LET CLIENTS BOOK 24/7
• No website? No problem—Square Appointments includes a free online booking site, so your customers can book anytime, from anywhere. Easily manage and accept bookings from the app on Android. And go to your Square Dashboard to turn on bookings with Google Search, Maps, Instagram, and more.

SEAMLESSLY CHECK OUT CLIENTS
• Every calendar entry has a checkout button, so you can quickly and easily accept payments, sell products, or send invoices all from one app. Customers can allow Square to save their card on file through their customer account for even faster checkout.

REDUCE NO-SHOWS
• Clients get automated appointment reminders, and you can request prepayment or charge a cancellation fee for online booking.

GET TO KNOW YOUR CLIENTS
• Keep notes on all your clients so you can keep track of their preferences and appointment and sales history.

This is more than just a calendar. Square Appointments is powerful appointment scheduling, a point of sale, and payment processing—all in one place.

comments: This app is missing the location option, the address of the onsite location for businesses that don't have clients coming to their location, for example, plumbers, roofers, etc.., need to enter the location of the site of appt. It's available in the desktop version but missing from the mobile app. Without this option this app is useless for onsite service type businesses. PLEASE FIX so it correlates with the desktop version!!!

After version 5.31 any edits made to appointments are not saved after pressing "Save". Fix this very critical bug! Also: Add ability to change a location from "default" (business location) to "customer's address" when creating an appointment through this app. Then it would be 5 stars

Is any one having g issues with the time zone sending the wrong appointment time to clients. I moved time zones and I have followed all the instructions given to fix the problem I changed it in settings, changed it in customers profile and even uninstalled and reinstalled. I have looked for a number to call square but that has been a no go. I loved this app until recently. HELP! Cause I want to keep loving it!

So far so good but I believe it could use couple things. 1. Online booking link needs to have fewer characters cant put on my business card 2. E Cards clients should be able to go directly to my online booking site and buy E Cards. They cant as of yet.
Needs to have the same abilities as the website in terms of scheduling. The ability to change address of service, changing recurring appointments, and altering schedule blocks/hours would be ideal.

title: Microsoft Teams
description:
Microsoft Teams is your hub for teamwork in Office 365. All your team conversations, files, meetings, and apps live together in a single shared workspace, and you can take it with you on your favorite mobile device. Whether you’re sprinting towards a deadline or sharing your next big idea, Teams can help you achieve more.

YOUR HUB FOR TEAMWORK
* Easily manage your team’s projects with file editing and sharing on the go
* Connect face-to-face with HD audio and video, and join meetings from almost anywhere
* Chat privately or in groups, and communicate with the entire team in dedicated channels
* Mention individual team members, or the whole team at once, to get your colleagues’ attention
* Focus on what matters most by saving important conversations and customizing your notifications
* Search your chats and team conversations to quickly find what you need
* Get the enterprise-level security and compliance you expect from Office 365

This app requires a paid Office 365 commercial subscription, or a free or trial subscription of Microsoft Teams. If you’re not sure about your company’s subscription or the services you have access to, visit Office.com/Teams to learn more or contact your IT department.

By downloading Teams, you agree to the license (see aka.ms/eulateamsmobile) and privacy terms (see aka.ms/privacy). For support or feedback, email us at mtandapp@microsoft.com

comments: I never tried the phone app, because after I tried the free PC app, it was non-intuitive, buggy, & all-around AWFUL. After once getting it to work w/ a video conference, I deleted a user & then tried to add him back but couldn't; the user activation emails did not work. I'm willing to try again in the future, once they get the problems worked out. Oh, & it should install once for ALL users on a PC. I've recommended to the county emergency mgmt team I work with, to use Zoom for the time being.

I love being able to be connected to work for emergencies. I can set my status and it syncs up to my calendar no problem. My company uses multiple platforms for communication. But I do think switching everyone to Microsoft teams would be very beneficial. I have not tested much of the group video conferencing. One feature that I do really like is that you can give someone access to your computer through teams to fix quick problems or collaborate.

With the COVID-19 outbreak, my office had to scramble to figure out how to work from home. Our IT Manager kept saying we we underutilizing this program and he was right! You can use it on multiple platforms - computer, tablet, phone. Awesome chat feature - so it streamlines conversations, use instead of text or email. Share and edit files with your partners, you can edit the same document together. Use Planner to assign tasks. Link a notebook people can share their research, project ideas.

I love Teams in theory. It's way easier than other systems to pull your documentation, meetings and general team collaboration together. However, the biggest issue is not being able to have multiple windows or tabs which means you lose all context if you need to quickly shift from a chat to a doc or have both open at the same time. Also, the complete lack of integration with Adobe around pdf documents means you need to download pdf docs every time as opposed to opening them natively.

I love Teams. I haven't mastered it yet, and I know there is so much more that can make me more productive at work, but it's easy to use, and making the transition from IBM Sometime and Lotus Notes to Teams has been an easy process. I really like how quickly it synced up with my Office 365 account on my work computer, laptop, and my phone. It keeps me in the knownwith my staff and my colleagues, and allows me to share progress on various projects quickly and easily.

title: Simple Scan - Free PDF Scanner App
description:
Want a moving scanner?

The Simple Scanner is a PDF document scanner application that turns your phone into a portable scanner. you can scan documents, photos, receipts, reports, or just about anything. The scan will be saved to the device in image or PDF format. Name and organize your scan to a folder, or share it in the following ways:


 -Automatically upload JPG and PDF files to the cloud disk
 -Backup and restore synchronization files between multiple devices
 - E-mail, print, Fax
 - Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, WhatsApp, or more
 - Wifi connects directly to your computer
 - Support importing PDF files into JPG.
 - Support for adding tags for quick file search.
 - Support OCR text recognition, export text.




Support system: Android 4.4 and above

The Document Scanner application has all the features you need:

- Mobile phone document, automatically remove the clutter background, generate high-definition JPEG pictures or PDF files.
- A variety of image processing mode, you can manually adjust the image parameters, with a mobile phone can be paper documents, quickly turned into a clear electronic draft.
- Scan color, grayscale, or black and white
- Can be used in office, school, home and any place you want
- Automatically detects page edges
- 5 levels of contrast for clear monochrome text
- Set the PDF page size (Letter, Legal, A4, etc.)
- Thumbnail or list view, sorted by date or title
- Simple scanner are optimized to run very fast.
- Quick search by document title
- Use a password to protect your documents
- General - A single application that works on your phone!

If you like simple scanner or have any other comments, please take a moment to write us a comment, or simply email us at simple.scanner@outlook.com, which will help us improve our products and give you a better experience. .

comments: Last time I used this app I remember it being great, this time (several months later) I am greeted basically no functionality in the app unless you upgrade to the pro version or pay an in app purchase. Basically this app is no longer free from what it seems. It's also littered with ads, including ones that randomly pop up and fill the whole screen. Unfortunate.

Well, I'm waiting for the pop-up adds and upsell, but so far, they haven't come. I use this kind of app for many things. I find it quite convenient and much nicer that many comparable apps. The app I used to use has become loaded with bloatware, pop-ups and it takes way too long to get anything done. This app far exceeds them. I highly recommend Simple Scan and will do so with word-of-mouth as well.

So far for my work requirements from the app. It does really well and recalls old documents as well in case. Keeps each time I access separate which I need. No need to clean sheet it. It does it on its own for me. I just keep taking pictures and it stores, sends as I need. Simple, effective, cool.

App is simple. Too many intrusive ads. Ads will pop out and make it difficult to look at or do anything. Instead of locking up more advanced features to paying customers, the developer appears to have decided to serve ads almost to the point that free version is unusable. It would be nice if the developer could keep the basic part of the app without ads popping out.

Does exactly what it says. Plus it's still free unlike majority of all the other similar apps that started of free but now want to charge for the same service. So would rather use this app which does exactly the same as them but for free. Hopefully this won't start charging once it gets a loyal customer base.

title: Skype for Business for Android
description:
Skype for Business, formerly Lync 2013, for Android extends the power of Lync and Skype to your favorite mobile device: voice & video over wireless, rich presence, instant messaging, conferencing, and calling features from a single, easy-to-use interface.

Key Features:
-Initiate a group IM or video conversation and invite additional participants
-Join, rejoin and initiate a Skype for Business Meeting to communicate and collaborate on amazing ideas
-Share your video and view speaker's video during a conference
-Control the meeting (mute or remove attendees) and know more about participants’ modalities
-Look at your upcoming meetings and join via one click
-Find your recent conversations and pick them up from where you left 
-Search your contacts by name, email, or phone number
-Enhanced security via Active Directory Authentication Library (ADAL)
 
Anyone can use the Skype for Business Mobile app when invited to a Skype for Business or Lync 2013 meeting. However, you must have a Skype for Business or Lync account in order to use (and enjoy) the full capability of the Skype for Business Mobile app. Also, some functionality might require an update to Lync or Skype for Business Server or might not be available to all users. If you’re not sure about your account status, please contact your IT department

IMPORTANT: THIS SOFTWARE REQUIRES CONNECTIVITY TO VALIDLY LICENSED COPIES OF MICROSOFT LYNC OR SKYPE FOR BUSINESS SERVER OR OFFICE 365 / LYNC ONLINE / SKYPE FOR BUSINESS ONLINE AND WILL NOT WORK WITHOUT IT. UPDATES TO MICROSOFT LYNC SERVER OR SKYPE FOR BUSINESS MAY BE REQUIRED FOR PROPER PERFORMANCE. SOME FUNCTIONALITY MAY NOT BE AVAILABLE IN ALL COUNTRIES. IF YOU ARE UNSURE ABOUT YOUR COMPANY’S LICENSE TO AND/OR DEPLOYMENT OF LYNC OR SKYPE FOR BUSINESS, PLEASE CONTACT YOUR IT DEPARTMENT. SKYPE FOR BUSINESS APP IS ONLY AVAILABLE FOR Android 4.0 OR GREATER.

comments: DO NOT UPDATE to the latest version. The app won't load anymore. I just uninstalled and reinstalled it a couple of times. Everytime I try to open it up, it tells me that it's "Missing Libraries". I've Googled the problem and it seems I am not the only one having this issue after updating. Microsoft is pointing the finger at Chromebook support.

A necessary mobile application to have when we need to attend an official call or talk to a colleague in case away from desk. However there are few issues faced as well at times like- 1. Sometimes the call gets stuck. 2. In case we are logged in to both mobile and machine, some messages get lost in transmission or half of msgs get delivered at either locations. It is not consistent. Overall a good app to have in situations.

So far it is good if you often have to talk to your colleagues when away from your desk. The problems I have are: 1. If you have a continuous discussion when in and out of the office, you cannot see your exchange on the desktop when on your mobile, and vice versa. 2. The quality of your call varies: not so good when on mobile internet, but really good when over a stable broadband. A couple of times a crucial call from our executive was so broken up, I had to ask his EA to call me on mobile.

I already updated my Skype for Business to the latest version, 6.27.0.12 but I still can't view meeting content being shared or presented by my peers. I am getting the error "Someone is presenting content using a sharing or recording feature that your version of the app doesn't support right now." I sent an e-mail to the developer e-mail address indicated but it bounced back. Can you please assist? Thank you.

Why did I buy this laptop?? Nothing works on it and for a person who works remote and needs certain applications, this system is useless to me. Can't wait to replace it with a windows based application. All I get from Skype for Business is ' missing libraries'..what does this even mean?? Your tech support cant even give an answer. This stinks!

title: Secure Folder
description:
This update is available for Samsung Mobile with Android 7.0 and above.

Secure Folder leverages the defence-grade Samsung Knox security platform to create a private, encrypted space on your Samsung Galaxy phone. Apps and data moved to Secure Folder are sandboxed separately on the device and gain an additional layer of security and privacy.

Easier and more convenient
Store your private files and apps safely. It's easy to move apps and data by tapping "Move to Secure Folder" or by importing them via "Add files" from inside Secure Folder. Your personal apps and data will be separated and encrypted so that they are protected from malicious attacks.

More secure
Lock your Secure Folder with an additional PIN, pattern, password, or biometric lock, so that only you can access your private pictures, apps, and data.

Effectively manage data
Add or copy your apps and data into Secure Folder. You can use Secure Folder to store your private contacts, photos, and more in a separate account. This allows you to have two profiles on a device so you can manage your data more effectively.

※ Secure Folder will operate only on official software released by Samsung Electronics. Features or UX may vary depending on the device, OS version, etc.

※ Secure Folder is a service, based on Samsung account, that provides an independent, isolated environment within your mobile device. Applications and data moved or added to Secure Folder (e.g. photos, audio files, movie files, and documents), will not be accessible from outside Secure Folder, whether by USB or Wi-Fi Direct. If your mobile device detects any rooting or custom ROMs, Secure Folder will automatically lock-up in order to prevent unauthorised access, in which case you will no longer be able to access or use the contents within Secure Folder. Therefore, please make sure you back up any important applications or data elsewhere, such as on your personal computer, before moving them to Secure Folder. Samsung is not responsible for any data loss or inaccessibility.

Use Backup and Restore of the below path to store your customers' data more safely.
Secure Folder > Settings > Backup and restore > Back up Secure Folder data

[Required Permissions]

- Calendar: For the purpose of providing the ‘Share calendar’ function
- Contact: For the purpose of using the registered account to set up Secure Folder
- Storage: For the purpose of backing up and restoring the content in Secure Folder or for the purpose of providing the data backup feature when adding or deleting files
- Body sensors: For the purpose of using the lock screen with fingerprints and iris

comments: Doesnt work at all. It says "first verify its you" so I enter my password and hit ok. Then it takes me back to the previous screen, which is "agree to terms" page. I hit agree and it goes back to "first verify its you" page. Repeats over and over and over. Tried updating. Tried changing password. Tried restarting phone. NOTHING makes this app work! On samsung S8.

The only issue I have so far is that any app (which is most Antivirus and Security apps) that need Accessibility permissions, cannot be altered from within the Secure Folder sandboxed process. That's a huge deal breaker considering it's suppose to be a secure space and yet no security apps are able to be configured or used within Secure Folder! Ridiculous really. Needs changing ASAP.

Love this app, however it could be greatly improved. The notifications are a bit buggy, and we need more options for notifications. For example, I wish there was an option for it to not show notifications at all unless the secure folder was on, and whenever I turned it off the notifications would be removed from the screen and be shown as soon as a turn the folder back on. I also wish apps like spotify were allowed. If those things were added I think it would be a perfect app.

While I still use this app for work on the daily, I am extremely upset to find that in one of the latest updates they removed the abilty to share my calendar outside of the Secure Folder environment. This was extremely useful, it allowed me to have my work calendar isolated in Secure Folder, but also visable in my personal calendar. Why is this useful? Because if I needed to add something to my personal calendar I can make sure it doesnt conflict with my work, while keeping everything segregated

It was a good app. It took the files and locked them in a folder, but it made the storage double on my phone. I guess it still kept the original version on the phone and put another one in secure folder.

title: IKEA Videos
description:
The IKEA Videos Mobile application provides IKEA co-workers with an intuitive and enjoyable way to watch, create, search and share videos on-the-go.
DISCOVER: Find what you are looking for whenever you need it with the powerful search. WATCH: watch videos delivered to you in playlists and channels, with mobile optimization. ENGAGE: with video content on-the-go anytime, including liking, commenting, and sharing. Get INSPIRED: interactive ways to find additional interesting content for you. ACCESS: log into the mobile app using the same credential as your web-based IKEA Video portal, with the same permissions and entitlements. DOWNLOAD: download media to your device in a secured manner so you'll be able to watch it offline on your Phone/tablet when internet access is not available. EVOLVING MOBILE CAPABILITIES: we are constantly adding unique features including the ability to create content, upload and publish it directly from within the app, and many other capabilities to empower you with video on the go. Stay tuned!

description:
The Google Ads mobile app helps you stay connected to your campaigns while on the go with your smartphone. You can track your ad campaigns in real-time, review high-impact recommendations to optimize performance, and take action quickly and easily, no matter where your business takes you.

Use the Google Ads app to:
* View and monitor your ad performance and campaign stats on the go, such as conversions, impressions, and clicks
* Manage and make quick updates to campaigns, bids, budgets, keywords, and more
* Create, add, and edit ads to drive sales, reach new online users and customers, and grow your business

* Get real-time notifications and alerts, such as performance summaries or ad disapprovals
* Call or chat with an expert for support, wherever you may be

Download the Google Ads mobile app to get the most out of your account today!

title: Indeed Job Inbox beta
description:
Indeed Job Inbox beta is a brand-new experience from the world’s #1 job site* that delivers the latest jobs directly to you as they're posted. Manage your job search with ease and discover your dream job.

Stay up to date
- Automatically receive the latest jobs matching your preferences
- Get notifications when new jobs arrive (optional)

Stay organized
- Save your favorite jobs and apply whenever you're ready
- Delete jobs that you’re not interested in
- Use labels to organize your jobs into categories

Bugs? Suggestions? We’re listening! Send us your feedback at job-inbox-fb@indeed.com.

FAQ
- I'm not getting any notifications! Battery-saving features on your phone may prevent Job Inbox from displaying notifications. Check the battery optimization or power saver section of your phone settings and make sure Job Inbox is allowed to run in the background. Instructions for many phone brands can be found at https://dontkillmyapp.com.
- Where can I view messages from employers? Please check the email address associated with your Indeed account or visit Indeed Messages at https://messages.indeed.com.

By downloading this app, you agree to Indeed's Cookie Policy, Privacy Policy and Terms of Service found at https://www.indeed.com/legal, where you may avail of your rights at any time, including the right to object to the legitimate interest use of your personal data for marketing purposes. In order to provide you with certain services and support ad attribution, user data, such as your IP address or other unique identifier and event data related to the installation of the Indeed App, may be shared with certain service providers when you download or install this app.

This is performed for the legitimate interest of allowing Indeed to understand and optimize our users' complete customer journey by:
- helping us understand how users arrive to Indeed
- better measure the performance of our ads;
- facilitating user logins through third party accounts in certain cases; and
- helping us understand where a user accesses Indeed through different devices

By downloading this app, you agree to Indeed's Cookie Policy, Privacy Policy and Terms of Service found at https://www.indeed.com/legal, where you may avail of your rights at any time, including the right to object to the legitimate interest use of your personal data for marketing purposes. In order to provide you with certain services and support ad attribution, user data, such as your IP address or other unique identifier and event data related to the installation of the Indeed App, may be shared with certain service providers when you download or install this app.

This is performed for the legitimate interest of allowing Indeed to understand and optimize our users' complete customer journey by:
- helping us understand how users arrive to Indeed
- better measure the performance of our ads;
- facilitating user logins through third party accounts in certain cases; and
- helping us understand where a user accesses Indeed through different devices

title: DTE Insight
description:
An All-New Smart Experience  Create a smarter home that works for you. The DTE Insight app helps you understand, manage and control the energy that powers your home and your life. Make your home smarter and more efficient now.

The More You See, the More You Save
How much energy does your home use each day? What does it cost? Where am I wasting energy in my home? DTE Insight tells you exactly how much energy you are using and gives you the tools to take control of it. Use less energy and save more money with DTE Insight.       

Control Your Home From Anywhere
Is your furnace working? Did you shut off the curling iron? How much does it cost when the kids play video games all night? Connect the Insight app to the Energy Bridge and you can see and control your energy use in real time. 

A Smart Home That Works for You
Can you adjust your thermostat so you always come home to a cool house on a hot day? Can your porch light turn on automatically at dusk? DTE Insight gives you a single, secure place to efficiently manage your home’s smart devices. 
Get the Premium Experience - Free for 6 Months
Enhance your experience and take advantage of all new features when you pair the Insight app with the Energy Bridge. Upgrade to the Premium experience and get your Energy Bridge FREE for 6 months.

Some features require connected smart devices and an Energy Bridge. Need help after downloading the app? In-app chat lets you talk with our support specialists!

recentChanges: - Minor bug fixes
comments: I have had this app since DTE first came out with it. When they started charging a fee for it, I decided it was worth the fee. It has been working great but all of a sudden it crashes everytime I try to open it. I uninstalled it and then reinstalled it but it will not allow me to log in. Then I got an email from DTE Energy saying too many failed logins had locked down my account and wanted me to reset my password, which I did. But still will not let the app open up.

Insight finally contacted me back on 2 diff occasions to follow up (mos apart & w/no prior knowledge anyone had). I keep using the app bc the energy reading are helpful but the gas still has missing days &/or data for days at a time, but it's better than it was. There's literally no point in contacting service. They have no clue what's going on w/the app or how to fix it besides clearing cache, force stop, reinstall. That fails, youre on your own, but they tell you the buy bridge. No thank you.

Cool app. I'm huge on saving energy so this really helps me see that and allows me to manage my usage. I also always forget to turn something off before I leave my place, so it's nice to check the app and see what I've left on, and with my smart bulbs and switches/outlets I can turn it off from my app at work. I also sometimes forget to unplug my straightener so that's another thing I can turn off once I've already left home. This app has probably prevented my house from catching on fire.

Wouldn't connect to my insight bridge until 11/12 app update. I spent 2+ hours with the DTE tech at my house (+ even more time with the phone support people). 11/15 update: Now I have intermittent data, but connection drops from time to time - it will go out for several hours per day. App lacks features, like being able to see peak v off peak use for a given day. It would be nice if the circle had different color background for peak, and if app showed total daily KWh, peak KWh, & off peak KWh.
Worked fine until 3 weeks ago. App is unstable and gives usage only in hours now instead of minutes. Today's usage only shows usage now and not before. Reinstalled app and all is good now.

Looking for a great job in Tennessee? Find your dream job using the JOBS4TN Mobile app. Instantly view any job posted to the web directly on your Android device.

title: Zoom Rooms
description:
Meet Happy. Bring beautiful, simple, scalable video conferencing with wireless content sharing and integrated audio to any meeting space – conference rooms, training rooms, huddle rooms, and executive offices.
 
Zoom Rooms software-based video conferencing system uses off-the-shelf, business-grade hardware for cameras, speakers, and monitors - making it the most flexible video solution. Easily connect to participants on mobile devices, desktops, and other rooms.
 
Zoom Rooms are easy to set up: 1. Configure your room on the Zoom web portal, 2. Install the Zoom Rooms application on a Mac or PC, 3. Install this app on your Android tablet, 4. Click "Meet Now" to start a meeting.
 
Key Features: 
● Best video and screen sharing quality 
● Quick setup to install Zoom Rooms with Outlook Exchange or Google Calendar
 ● Wireless screen sharing from any device
  ● Supports up to 3 HD screens to fit any conference room
● View the active speaker, shared content, or gallery view with 25 video feeds
  ● One-click room-to-room calling 
● Up to 500 interactive participants or 10,000 view-only attendees (optional add-on)
● Record your meetings to share or review later
● Connect with anyone on Zoom Rooms, Android, iOS, Windows, Mac, H.323/SIP room systems, telephones, and other devices

Brand New

comments: When we first signed up with Nextiva the app was in early stages but since then they’ve made lots of great updates and I really like it now. I can switch between functions easily and I have all my contacts loaded in for easy calling and texting. It’s a great design and when they do make changes and updates they make it easy to learn and adapt to the changes. Really happy with it overall.

I can run all my calls through this app and it’s easier than switching to my desk phone. All calls and texts are tracked into our CRM for the service team if records are needed. The systems are synced together and working really well for our business. I am really impressed with the design and functionality.

The update was horrible. I hate the IM screen being the main screen. I wish the phone dial pad was like before. The app glitches allot. Just seems like a cheap product. My business model does not allow me to get something different or believe me I would! I causes more problems than it's worth.

Won't Accept User Name/PW. I have to work from home now and the app won't accept my credentials. I logged in in my phone and work computer just fine, but when I got home and installed it won't let me login on the Desktop or Android versions. My credentials work on the website so it doesn't make sense. Terrible support, emailed yesterday as soon as I noticed but no response.

This app is packed with features for managing a business and handling lots of calls throughout the day. The forwarding options make it easy for me to manage meeting time and ensure I’m not disrupted. I can also send and store text messages against a customer's profile so that we have a record of all communications. It’s secure and fast and overall nicely designed too.

description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: For optimal use, Polycom recommends provisioning and management through Polycom RealPresence platform. 

Polycom RealPresence Mobile is for business professionals who want to extend their enterprise video collaboration capabilities beyond the office and conference room to their mobile devices. RealPresence Mobile is an easy-to-use video app that provides premium quality audio, video and content sharing. Cloud-based deployment gives users access to enterprise directories at the swipe-of-a finger. Users simply highlight a name, connect, and then collaborate.


Features and Benefits: 

•	Share the industry’s highest-quality audio, video and content through standards-based protocols using the latest in compression technologies

•	Protect your network and maintain high-scale call volume through tight integration with RealPresence Access Director

•	Leverage an intuitive, consistent user interface across your mobile, desktop and room-based systems for increased productivity without complex user training

You must not be in violation of your wireless data service agreement, if any, when using Polycom RealPresence Mobile. Because some mobile network operators may prohibit or restrict the use of Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) functionality over their networks, such as the use of VoIP telephony over a cellular network, and may also impose additional fees, or other charges in connection with VoIP, POLYCOM recommends that you check the terms of your agreement with the operator prior to any use of the RealPresence Mobile.

Polycom RealPresence Mobile for Android is supported on a wide variety of devices – see the release notes at  http://support.polycom.com/PolycomService/support/us/support/video/realpresence_mobile/realpresence_mobile.html  for the complete list of supported devices and OS versions. Polycom does not provide support or certify any functionality of RealPresence Mobile on other Android devices or OS versions. Consult the Polycom RealPresence Mobile Support Forums at  http://community.polycom.com/t5/RealPresence-Mobile/bd-p/RealPresence_Mobile if you encounter issues with unsupported devices.

recentChanges:

comments: Call quality is good but the user experience is bad. No proper way to hang up the call - the off button does not work. And it is still running at the back even I closed the app, and there is no way to display that call and end it.

Cannot hear or see the people on the other side. It connects to our polycom server fine, but though they can see and hear me, I cannot see or hear anything. The connection indicator on the bottom left becomes red. Polycom has not been able to help solve this either.

Gave it a 4 but there a real Branding problem : in AppStore the app is named 'RealPresence Mobile', the badge says 'Polycom' and the Android App name is 'Video'. I just spent 5 minutes searching my apps for an App named 'Polycom' or 'RealPresence' and I couldn't find it! Luckily, when I reached the letter 'V', I recognized the icon. Talk about a mess, I almost missed my meeting.
I can't even accept the user agreement despite scrolling up and down and up and down, reinstalling, more scrolling, just letting it set for 10 minutes.... nothing
The "OK" button is greyed out when accepting terms and conditions, so I am unable to use the app.

title: Help Lightning
description:
Merged Reality and Virtual Interaction — digitally merge two real-time views, blending local and remote collaborative video streams to give or receive interactive help anywhere. Instantly. Help Lightning offers the most practical and useful application of Augmented Reality available for Android.

Help Lightning delivers patented, merged reality, and virtual interactive presence technologies for users needing help solving problems currently across 50 countries. Merged reality and virtual interaction allows digital merging of two real-time views blending local and remote collaborative video streams.

Experts can visually collaborate, assist with issues, and resolve problems as though they were working side-by-side with a colleague or customer. Use Help Lightning to give or receive interactive help anywhere, instantly.

title: LinkedIn: Jobs, Business News & Social Networking
description:
Find business opportunities for the new year with the LinkedIn app. Use the #1 job search, business news and professional networking app to apply for jobs, connect to your business contacts, stay up to date with companies and follow influencers. Let business networking with LinkedIn help you land your dream job.

Job seeker looking for new employment? Business networking to make new contacts? Want to find work and make a change in your career? Looking for business news and industry buzz? Searching for new business opportunities? Do that and more with the free LinkedIn app.

Job search, make business contacts, build your professional profile, keep in touch with your professional network and find new business opportunities.

Boost your job search and find your new career. LinkedIn lets you build a profile highlighting your professional experience, letting you show your successes, skills and your network. Search jobs and filter through millions of openings to find the right positions for you. Apply for jobs with your resume or professional profile in just a few taps. Job applications can use your LinkedIn profile as your resume apply.

Start business networking to keep in touch with connections and other business professionals. Use LinkedIn to ask your business contacts for referrals, share posts and converse with fellow professionals to boost your odds of getting hired

Build your business network of professionals, share your knowledge and connect with, employers and employees. LinkedIn makes business networking easy by connecting you with friends, colleagues, companies, industry experts, and the rest of the LinkedIn community.

5 reasons why you’ll love the LinkedIn app:

- Business networking: Follow the activities of your business contacts
- Job search & recruiting: Find the right position suited to your skills and apply with your resume
- Find work opportunities: See if companies you’re interested in are hiring
- Business news: Share articles or write your own posts
- Social network: Create your own profile & highlight your skillset

Find work, create business contacts, build your employee profile, apply for your dream job and connect with recruiters, professionals, and companies. LinkedIn helps you get your job search started.

LinkedIn App Features:

JOB SEARCH APP & CAREER FINDER
• Find jobs & apply using your LinkedIn profile and/or resume
• Connect with job recruiters & find new contacts
• Set job alerts to get notified when new jobs from your followed companies are posted

BUSINESS NETWORKING
• Follow companies, influencers and professionals to see updates & activities
• Network on the go; get new contacts and easily find industry experts
• Leverage your employees to build the talent brand of your company
• Social networking for businesses: showcase your company or product to find new opportunities

BUSINESS NEWS
• Share articles with the LinkedIn community and your business contacts
• Write your own posts & share them with your social network

RESUME PROFILE
• Send job applications using your LinkedIn profile as your resume
• Use your LinkedIn profile as a virtual resume to highlight your experience
• Share your accomplishments, job responsibilities and skills on your professional profile

SOCIAL NETWORKING
• Join job seeker groups that share and support your goals
• Import your contacts for a quick and easy way to grow your network
• Connect to the largest social network of professionals from around the globe

Job search tools, recruiters, professionals, industry experts, and career opportunities are available at your fingertips. The LinkedIn app offers a great way to network, apply to jobs and find new contacts - straight from your phone, wherever you are.

Want to make the most of LinkedIn? Upgrade to a Premium subscription for exclusive tools.

We ask for a few permissions when you use this app. Here’s why: http://linkd.in/1l0S8YZ

comments: Bug: On the My Network page, when scrolling, if you scroll within a section of the page (say, for people you might know from work) and then attempt to continue scrolling by touching the screen inside the area for another section of the page (say, for people in your area), the app's response is sluggish, glitchy and generally non-responsive until scrolling has stopped. Sometimes it fails to scroll, sometimes it scrolls disproportionately and sometimes it scrolls after a delay.

It's show for updates every time. I don't know what are you changing day by day. Before few months I was running so better than nowadays. I am irritating to use this app. I am making some distance to use this because of updating every day. And after updates while I open the app then it show network issue. Why its happening.?

I appreciate the efforts of developers for constantly upgrading this app but forcing me to update this app every few months that is what irritates me the most. I was very much comfortable with the features and interface that were there a couple of years ago. Because of the annoying push notification of update was what drove me to uninstall this app. Any how am back now only to see many more irritating features. Cant say when would i do the next uninstall maybe for good this time.

The app itself is very useful, but for a long time the scrolling on "My network" section has been malfunctioning, lagging and jittering all the time. The "My network" scrolling is unresponsive most of the time, which is something that doesn't happen on iOS. This needs to be fixed as soon as possible, as it ruins the experience for Android users.

Few years later and I don't see any development in this app. Yes, the idea is good and this is what makes me still use it but I am so disappointed. Recently I removed some connections because I am no longer interested in their accounts and you know what? Now they are all in the "suggestions" section. All I see is the faces of people who I just have removed. Great! In addition I moved to a different company/industry but I mainly see contacts from my previous job/industry.

title: It Works! Sampling
description:
IW! Sample allows users to quickly connect with prospects and offer samples. Share powerful content, including videos, images, audio files, and PDFs with prospects, family, and friends using an easy-to-use, state-of-the-art interface.  

Powerful, Easy-to-Use Features Include:

Shareable Content: Impactful, ready-to-use content accompanied by fully-customizable, pre-written messages that you can share with prospects by entering their contact information manually or selecting them from your contacts.  Share content via email, text message, or any major chat app.

View Content: View videos, PDFs, and other content directly from the app and share with prospects.

Contact Management System: A complete Contact Management System (CMS) allows you to track the recruiting status of your prospects.

Prospect History: A complete history of all your activity with each prospect is available so you can see the exact content you have sent to each prospect, whether the prospect has viewed the content, and how much of the content your prospect has viewed.

Email/Push Alerts: Automated email and push alerts notify you when a video you shared is watched, a website link you shared is visited, or an event invitation you sent is accepted. 

Automated Reminder System: A powerful, automated reminder system allows you to schedule email and push alerts that remind you to follow up with prospects, so you never forget.

title: USPS MOBILE®
description:
Access popular USPS.com® tools on the go with the “USPS Mobile®” app: calculate shipping prices (limitations apply), find a Post Office ™, look up a ZIP Code™, schedule a next-day pickup, request USPS to hold your mail, access Informed Delivery® to track packages and digitally preview incoming mail, and more.

•	Check the status of shipments sent using Priority Mail®, Priority Mail Express®, Certified Mail®, and certain other delivery services.  Nickname your shipments and sign up for text and email alerts to notify you of the delivery status.
 
•	Calculate a Domestic or International Price to determine how much postage you will need when you ship a letter, card, large envelope, or package (limitations apply). Choose retail or online pricing, add any extra services you need, and view the total, too.

•	Find USPS® Locations when you need to get to a Post Office™, Self-Service Kiosk (APC®) or collection box with an easy-to-filter locator. The USPS Mobile app uses your device’s GPS to show your closest options on a map, along with their Regular Hours, Special Hours and Last Collection Times, and provides mapped results with driving, walking, or transit directions. 

•	Look up a ZIP Code™ for any U.S. or Canadian address.

•	Schedule a free next-day pickup and have your Letter Carrier pick up Priority Mail®, Priority Mail Express®, Global Express Guaranteed®, or Merchandise Return Services shipments from your home or office during regular mail delivery. 

•	Request Hold Mail Service while you’re away, and we’ll keep your mail at your local Post Office™ for you to pick up or be delivered by your carrier when you return.

•	Scan the barcode on shipping labels with your device’s camera.  The app recognizes the shipment and stores the label number, so you can stay on top of delivery status.

•	Link to Informed Delivery to track packages and digitally preview your household’s incoming mail arriving soon; view grayscale images of the exterior, address side of letter-sized mailpieces.

recentChanges: Maintenance and bug fixes
comments: This app is wonderful! Very easy to use, I can track packages that I've ordered, and they make it super-easy to calculate how much something will cost to ship with their awesome shipping calculator. They even give you the option to receive updates via text message whenever your order/package is scanned when going from one post office to another. This app has definitely made my life a little bit easier! I highly recommend it! Thanks 🙂

This WAS a great and useful app until it was updated. I usually had my mail held nearly every month, but I've only successfully had it held one time in the last few months. It's not the post office or carrier...it's the app. I can enter a start date to hold my mail, but when I try to enter an end date (3 or more days' hold), it changes the start date to the date I want it to end. For the "Hold Mail" feature, this app is now TOTALLY USELESS.

So easy to use. I tell everyone about it. Update.. Feb 11, 2024.. Still great for seeing what mail/packages r coming. The one thing that's frustrating is even though I select to stay signed in, Iit doesn't n i have hard time remembering username n password..ugh.. Update-3/19/20 can't remem passwords or username n still won't stay logged in

Knowing that you have mail or packages in advance is a plus. So if a piece is not delivered USPS can check on it. I would not have know this without this service. It also helps when you sharecan apartment, which has happen they had a piece of my mail by mistake because they did not check well their mail. Thanks for this service.

I was having problems with my mail after i purchased a P.O. Box it well over a month to get my mail straightened out, to make a long story short I downloaded the USPS mobile app. I love it!! I will receive alerts from the post office when I have mail or a package in my P.O. Box and it will show what it is!! Love this app.

title: SightCall
description:
Designed with field technicians and mobile experts in mind, the SightCall App enables the deskless workforce to engage in interactive, mobile-to-mobile visual support sessions. With the click of a button, technicians in the field can share their environment through a live video stream and receive immediate AR-powered assistance from a remote expert. The expert can see and guide the technician with local and remote controls including:
- Pause Video and Draw on Screen
- Capture and Save HD Photos
- Document Share and Co-Browse
- Remote Flashlight Activation for Better Visibility
- Remote Zoom for Clarity and Understanding
- Collect Product Numbers and Codes with Optical Character Recognition
and More

The SightCall App is compatible with Salesforce, ServiceNow, ZenDesk and other leading workflows and CRMs. Users can automatically save images, videos and associated data back to their case files for continuity and training.
 
Deployed globally, the SightCall App is used by field service organizations to:
- request visual assistance from the home office or expert of your choosing
- provide visual assistance to other colleagues in the field
- improve service performance and improve customer experience

title: Glassdoor Jobs & Career - find jobs, apply today
description:
Find jobs, salary references and company reviews in one handy place, with the Glassdoor app. Upload your resume and tap into the world’s most comprehensive career community, straight from your phone.

Job search and career builder on the go - read the freshest job openings and honest company reviews, wherever you are. Plus, you can find out what it's really like to work for companies; from office culture to salaries, we've got everything you need to know to follow your dream career and discover a job you'll love!

Career builder, job search, mobile resume & more: 5 amazingly useful features on the Glassdoor app:

1. Job search - Our powerful job search tool automatically finds the most suitable new vacancies for you among millions of job openings
2. Company reviews - Know what former and current employees really think and see salaries and the office culture
3. Apply on the go - Save jobs or apply directly from your phone so you'll never miss out on a good career opportunity (just look for the ‘Apply on Phone’ label)
4. Interview Questions & Reviews - Got an interview? Prepare by reading typical questions and interview experiences
5. Find jobs suited to you - We'll alert you when we see new jobs listings that match your job search

Get access to the latest job openings as well as company reviews and salary reports, shared by those who know the company best – the employees. You can also upload your resume so you’re always ready to apply. Job-hunting has never been so transparent, easy, and efficient.

Download your career builder now and find jobs, apply on the go and read about the work and office details that really matter to you:

Salaries and more
• Use the 'Know Your Worth' tool to reveal how your market value has trended over time, how it compares to typical workers in the same field, and also plot your current base salary
• See salary and compensation by company, job title and location

Job Search & Vacancy Alerts
• Receive instant push notifications as soon as we find job openings suited to you
• Quickly create a saved search for any job title and location of interest
• Easily see which job openings are new in the last day

Apply On Your Phone
• Save jobs or apply directly from your phone so you'll never miss out on a good opportunity (just look for the 'Apply on Phone' label)
• Swipe on a job listing to email it over, view the company profile or follow the company and more

Company Reviews, Salaries & more
• Read reviews from employees about the work environment, culture, senior leaders and more
• View pros, cons, and advice to senior management
• Get opinions from current and former employees about specific companies

Follow Companies

• Easily find your way back to the companies you love on the "Companies" tab
• Get relevant suggestions for new companies to follow

Job Interview Questions & Reviews
• Read reviews from applicants about the interview experience
• See job interview questions that top companies are asking

comments: unfortunately this app is not functional anymore. You can't search for anything, if you tap on search, another window is opening(!) nothing happens. I'll just use the website. pity. Still. After googling something and there is a prompt to open the app it just can't open. After about 3 years, 2 devices, the app is just broken. I am always updated.

As of very recently, the app no longer functions correctly. I cannot press "apply" when changing filters for job searches, this issue persisted after clearing cache and data. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app, and at the login section, when pressing Skip, I am unable to press any of the buttons on the next pop-up confirming that I want to skip login.

Doesn't save my searches or save any jobs. Always freezing or crashing. I can't even upload my resume. I've tried updating from my phone, google drive, and dropbox. For some reason it keeps saying the upload failed and it is not because of the size or format. Every time I attempt to put in the information by typing I just get a blank screen and it freezes up. I can't even see what information/email I used to sign up with so that I can just try and do it on my laptop

The search function does not work right. I would like to search for jobs across the country and the location setting is "(optional)"; however, it will not conduct a search unless you put in a location. It becomes very tedious to have to search city by city. This should be corrected. Also, the instructions for closing an account lead to a bunch of dead ends. There are no close account options under the profile settings as noted in the help section.

It has been somewhat easy to use but definitely still needs improvements such as allowing me to file jobs that I have applied for into its own category so that when I get a response from employers, I can go find the relevant job description for reference (the existing "Applied Jobs" tab is useless). Jobs by proximity doesn't seem to do much help.

You’re busy, so let UPS help you easily manage shipments, track packages, find UPS locations, and much more with the UPS Mobile app. Download the UPS Mobile app to: 

Track

- Find and follow your deliveries in transit
- Update your delivery location or change your delivery date
- Get delivery alerts to know when your package will arrive
 
Ship

recentChanges:
At UPS, we use your feedback to enhance the performance of the app. New features and improvements include:

- Ongoing enhancements to accessibility functionality
- Increased login options and security
- General performance and bug fixes


Based on the California Personal Privacy Act of 2018, updates have been made to “Do Not Sell My Personal Information”. Please review these changes within the Privacy Notice on ups.com.
comments: The older version was better, in my opinion. You were allowed to sign and tell the driver where to place it, and tracking, for the most part was spot on! Now, with this newer version, it sucks!! Rarely does it update, I've only been able to sign for my package once. SUCKS! Update: 19 July 2019 App seemed to be working alright, for a bit. Now when I try to sign for an order it tells me the package I'm signing for is not in my name...app still SUCKS!

I love this app, but it needs some updates, like for example: to let the person who is wanting to ship the package out how much it actually weighs, and the actual measurements of the length, width, and height of the box that is going to be shipped out like for example: 1.75 inches or 1.5 inches, so that the person who is shipping the package out and the person who is purchasing the item or items inside of the box know how much the actual price the shipping is for any box, big or small or medium.

I really like this app. The only issue I have is that I can't delete old addresses that are no longer needed. It really causes problems when it automatically goes to the old address first. Other than that its a great app and I like it better than the other package delivery app I have. Its easier to use and less confusing.

For the most part the UPS Mobile application works great. For those who use it every day to do their business, I am sure it is a perfect tool. For those of us who only use it once in a while, though, it can be quite cumbersome and tedious. Each time I sign onto the application it has been updated and I must relearn, even update my information. And now I've received an email indicating that I may have bought a service in all my confusion.😳

Very easy to use and understand. I've only used it to track my packages because I like to have an idea of when my packages are arriving and because of porch pirates, and it's been super helpful. It's pretty up to date. I can get my package off my porch within minutes of drop off. Just love this app.

title: NorthOne - Business Banking
description:
Open a NorthOne business account in 3 minutes and never step foot in a bank branch again. With NorthOne, you get unlimited free debit card transactions and tons of powerful features including:


3 Minute Account Opening
- With NorthOne, it only takes 3 minutes to get a fully insured business bank account. It’s 100% online, and 0% annoying.

100% Digital Banking
- Send and receive payments (ACHs, Wires, and more!)
- Accounts are government insured through the FDIC.
- Free, unlimited debit card transactions.
- Order new debit cards in one tap.
- Open sub-accounts for taxes, payroll, big purchases.
- Deposit cheques from your phone with mobile check deposit.

Features That Save You Up To 50% On Your Bookkeeping
- Unlimited account history.
- Automatic transaction & expense categorization.

Support That Fits Your Schedule
- Send us an in-app live chat and we’ll respond in minutes.
- Schedule a phone call. (No more waiting on hold with your bank)!

Powerful Debit Card Controls
- View spending reports for specific cards.
- Report your cards as lost or stolen.

Radically Transparent Pricing
- Unlimited free debit card transactions.
- Accounts start at $10 a month and scale with your business.
- Never pay for what you don’t need: we’ll reimburse you when you use your account less.

More Powerful Features, Including:
- Visualize your revenue & expenses with customizable dashboards that allow you to see your information the way you want.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What People Are Saying About NorthOne

"Imagine how much time NorthOne will save us! I can’t wait to have more of it for the important things, like, oh I don’t know, our customers?" - Daniel Wolfe

"I’ve found my tribe. These people think and move the way I do and are thinking about banking the way I would." - Ingrid Enriquez-Donissaint

"The folks behind this are impressive and they really care about making life easier for businesses like mine." - Steve Merling

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Want to learn more?
- Visit our website at https://northone.com
- Learn more about our pricing at https://www.northone.com/features#pricing
- Send us a message on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/northoneapp/
