comments: I've used this for years with no issues. I love all the different settings to scan color, change the brightness, etc. Also I can choose PDF or JPEG and that has been a lifesaver as sometimes I scan things to copy into other documents. Sorry I didnt review you guys sooner because honestly I would recommend it to anyone.

Liked it, pretty easy to use! Like anything else I had to play wih it. I have an Android phone, so my camera is a little sucky, but the app. still managed to crop and make the images very clear! Thank you Fast Scanner (last but not least FREE, FREE, FREE)!!!!!

I use this for "photocopying" musical scores. The resulting pdfs are always super clear even when my hands were shaking or the lighting wasn't optimal. Adds pop up in the middle of your work, which is annoying, but it's a small price to pay to not have to make a trip to a place where I have to pay to make photocopies. Also easily allows you to send the PDFs via email and a few other apps.

Sure, the ads are annoying, BUT I love this app and it's free! So I can suffer through a few annoying add. However, if there were more or they significantly interfered with the efficiency of this app, I would reconsider the high rating and using the app overall.

This is the best tool!! Far better, faster and quality than the scanner on my printer. I use it for timesheets and photos as it reduces images so they can be emailed quicker or stored. Couldn't be without the fast scanner app now😊

title: Amazon A to Z
description:
Amazon A to Z gives you access to all the tools to manage your work-life at Amazon. Use the app to manage your profile information, submit time off requests, check your schedule, claim extra shifts, see the latest news, and more.
 
Getting started:
 
• As an Amazon hourly Associate, download the A to Z app
• Login with your Amazon login credentials (not your personal Amazon account)
• Update your profile if needed with your phone number and emergency contact
• Verify your direct deposit information
• Configure your notification preferences to stay in the know
 
After getting the basics out of the way, A to Z will be your portal to everything from schedule management to getting your Amazon.com discount code.
 
Feature highlights:
 
• Time: submit time off requests, check your accrual balances, and claim voluntary extra time or time off 
• Schedule: view in/out times, upcoming shifts, and calendar
• Pay: view pay, tax, and direct deposit information
• News: stay up to date with the latest happenings internal to Amazon
• Profile: update personal information, emergency contacts, and view your Amazon.com discount code
• Resources: visit several other employee resources for new jobs, retirement planning, learning management, and more

title: Hyer
description:
Are you someone looking to earn income or discover opportunities on your own terms? We’ve got you covered. We understand how time-consuming it is to find jobs that meet your financial needs, match your special skills and fit your schedule.

Does your business need to expand coverage, or scale its workforce on-demand? Hyer can help. We know how difficult it is to recruit, background-check and schedule contract-based workers.

Our vision is to connect people to opportunities and businesses to resources, while we elevate those relationships, drive quality interactions, and support the communities in which we serve.

We’re adding new work and more locations every day; as the Hyer community grows, that means there are more opportunities for you to make money, and more options for businesses to grow. In doing so, we’re changing how Life gets done, every day.

We are live in the Detroit area with opportunities arriving May 2019, and plans to expand to multiple cities through the end of year and 2020.

Hyer’s Underlying Magic

• It’s Safe and Secure
Your privacy and security comes first. Hyer’s secure network, background checks and vetting process helps to build a community everyone can trust and feel good about.

• Our Best Match System
Whether you’re searching for help or looking for opportunities, Hyer’s built-in technology is always working for you. We strive to connect you to what you’re looking for; when and where you need it.

• Hyer Profiles
People can introduce themselves, build a following, or get to know the people they'd like to hire. Hyer’s detailed profiles help showcase what makes people special and businesses unique.

• Payments Made Simple
Hyer’s payment partner Stripe makes it easy to receive payment, or pay who you’ve hired. Safe, secure and all right in the app.

• A Sense of Community

descriptionHTML:
Are you someone looking to earn income or discover opportunities on your own terms? We’ve got you covered. We understand how time-consuming it is to find jobs that meet your financial needs, match your special skills and fit your schedule.

Does your business need to expand coverage, or scale its workforce on-demand? Hyer can help. We know how difficult it is to recruit, background-check and schedule contract-based workers.

Our vision is to connect people to opportunities and businesses to resources, while we elevate those relationships, drive quality interactions, and support the communities in which we serve.

We’re adding new work and more locations every day; as the Hyer community grows, that means there are more opportunities for you to make money, and more options for businesses to grow. In doing so, we’re changing how Life gets done, every day.

We are live in the Detroit area with opportunities arriving May 2019, and plans to expand to multiple cities through the end of year and 2020.

Hyer’s Underlying Magic

• It’s Safe and Secure
Your privacy and security comes first. Hyer’s secure network, background checks and vetting process helps to build a community everyone can trust and feel good about.

• Our Best Match System
Whether you’re searching for help or looking for opportunities, Hyer’s built-in technology is always working for you. We strive to connect you to what you’re looking for; when and where you need it.

• Hyer Profiles
